title: Basics
content:
## Start NPM 

```bash
# Execute inside work project
npm init
```

### Start NPM Agree to ALL

```bash
# Make sure you change defaults
npm init -y
```



### Change Default Author

```bash
npm config set init-author-name "Bill Bennett"
```


### Change Default License

```bash
npm set init-license "MIT"
```

### Check Current Author

```bash
npm get init-author-name
```


### Delete all defaults

```bash
npm config delete init-author-name
```


### Install Module with dev Dependencies

```bash
# Install Gulp Sass Plugin on web dependency
npm install gulp gulp-sass -dev
```


### Install Regular Dependencies + Dev 

```bash
# Run from Folder
npm install 
```

### Install Only Regular Dependencies 

```bash
# Run from Folder
npm install --production
```

### Remove Dev Dependency

```bash
# Remove
npm uninstall gulp-sass -dev

# Remove
npm rm gulp-sass -dev

# Remove
npm un gulp-sass -dev
```
